Title: SharePoint Document Library Mirroring
Description: In the style of SourceSafe's Shadow Folders, Document Library Mirroring uses the SharePoint audit log to mirror changes to document libraries to a designated location on the file system.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
In the style of SourceSafe's Shadow Folders, Document Library Mirroring uses the SharePoint audit log to mirror changes to document libraries to a designated location on the file system.

Further details as to the aims of the proect and an overview of the implementation can be found here: http://datagility.wordpress.com/2010/10/06/docmirror/

Update: The current version is the SharePoint 2010 port of the project.
